title.rendered: November 8, 2024 – All After School Activities Are Cancelled

content.rendered: All afterschool activities are cancelled for today, Friday November 8th. All students are to ride their bus home or get picked up at dismissal time. Again, friendly reminder, we have early dismissal for students today beginning at 2:00pm.
